title: Make New Mission creation form fully usable on mobile without scrolling to add tasks

requirements.text: Update the New Mission creation UI (MissionEditorDialog) so that on mobile-sized viewports the full mission creation form is immediately usable without scrolling—specifically, the Mission title input, the Add task input + add button, and the primary actions (Cancel / Create Mission) must all be visible at once when the dialog opens.

quotes: Επικεντρώσου μόνο στην λειτουργία Mission και συγκεκριμενα στην φόρμα συμπλήρωσης νέου mission ... η σελίδα της φόρμας νέου mission να ανοίγει με όλο το περιεχόμενο συμπλήρωσης της ορατό στον χρήστη ... χωρίς να χρειάζεται να κάνει scroll για να προσθέσει τα task . Μην αλλαξεις τίποτα άλλο...

acceptanceCriteria: On a mobile viewport (e.g., <= 640px width), opening “New Mission” shows the mission title input, the task entry input ("Add a new task...") with its add button, and the Cancel/Create buttons without requiring any scroll.
Adding tasks remains possible immediately after opening the dialog (no forced scrolling to reach the task input).
If the task list grows beyond available space, only the task list area becomes scrollable; the task input row and action buttons remain accessible (no need to scroll to reach them).
All existing mission creation behaviors remain intact (validation, toasts, create mutation, closing behavior).

requirements.text: Limit changes strictly to the Mission creation form UI implementation (MissionEditorDialog) and any directly-required Mission UI wiring; do not modify other app areas, flows, or startup/login behavior.

quotes: Μην αλλαξεις τίποτα άλλο στην εφαρμογή και στις υπόλοιπες λειτουργίες της ώστε η εφαρμογή να λειτουργεί άμεσα όταν συνδεθεί ο χρήστης .

acceptanceCriteria: No changes to non-Mission screens/components are required for this update.
User can still log in and use the app immediately after login as before (no new loading gates, no new initialization steps).

constraints: Frontend-only change unless a backend change is proven strictly necessary (default: no backend changes).
Do not change any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI primitives only).
Keep all changes scoped to the Mission feature, specifically the New Mission creation form (MissionEditorDialog).
Do not alter other application functionality, flows, or startup behavior.
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall Missions list or Mission detail screens.
Changing mission data models, backend APIs, or persistence behavior.
Adding new features beyond improving the mobile usability/layout of the New Mission form.
